items.raw_string: 1 June 2017, received from Bragg Central Limited, PO Box 6830, Bridport DT6 9BH, three tickets (value £238 each; £714 in total) for the Glastonbury Festival from 23 to 25 June 2017, in return for giving a speech. I gave one ticket to a community group. Hours: 8 hrs. (Registered 21 August 2017)
